actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-971.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 217 - 179 (Record Vote No: 464).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 1965) to designate certain lands in the Mark Twain National Forest in Missouri, which comprise approximately six thousand eight hundred and eighty-eight acres, and which are generally depicted on a map entitled "Paddy Creek Wilderness Area", as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 1965 (Wilderness designation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 1965) to designate certain lands in the Mark Twain National Forest in Missouri, which comprise approximately six thousand eight hundred and eighty-eight acres, and which are generally depicted on a map entitled "Paddy Creek Wilderness Area", as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
